name: King of the Guns
description:
King of the Guns is action platformer game up to 4 players, where players are spawned in a battlefield map to kill each other. Choose between 6 characters and win against each other. Collect guns and power-ups to guide you on killing your enemies. Enjoy intense versus battles against your enemies. Rage by making killing streaks.

Key features:

  • 2-4 player battle with 3 games modes
  • 6 characters to choose from
  • 7 guns to use
  • 5 maps
  • Battle Logs
  • AI can be added

Note:

You can pause the game using esc.

You are invincible while dashing.

If the game is lagging, you can turn off the effects in the settings.

There may be errors in playing on browser. You can just download the game.
